comment: Under a non-freeness hypothesis, the implication ~ 19.38 can be strengthened to an equivalence. See also ~ 19.38a . (Contributed by BJ, 3-Nov-2021.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 9-Jul-2022.)
